languages.text: {n}Глядя Глейто прямо в глаза, вы внушительно надвигаетесь на него, медленно, но неумолимо протягиваете руку к его шее. Пес глухо рычит, челюсть приоткрывается, но ваш тяжелый взгляд будто давит его к земле. Твердо взяв Глейто за ошейник, вы видите, как все его тело обмякает, и он бессильно ложится на брюхо.{/n}

{n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя Глейто прямо в глаза, вы внушительно надвигаетесь на него, медленно, но неумолимо протягиваете руку к его шее. Пес глухо рычит, челюсть приоткрывается, но ваш тяжелый взгляд будто давит его к земле. Твердо взяв Глейто за ошейник, вы видите, как все его тело обмякает, и он бессильно ложится на брюхо.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du schaust Glaito tief in die Augen, richtest dich bedrohlich vor ihm auf und greifst langsam nach seinem Nacken. Der Hund stößt ein lautes Knurren aus und öffnet sein Maul, aber dein fester Blick scheint ihn auf dem Boden festzunageln. Also du Glaito fest an seinem Halsband packst, erschlafft sein ganzer Körper und er sinkt hilflos auf seinen Bauch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du schaust Glaito tief in die Augen, richtest dich bedrohlich vor ihm auf und greifst langsam nach seinem Nacken. Der Hund stößt ein lautes Knurren aus und öffnet sein Maul, aber dein fester Blick scheint ihn auf dem Boden festzunageln. Also du Glaito fest an seinem Halsband packst, erschlafft sein ganzer Körper und er sinkt hilflos auf seinen Bauch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous dressez devant Glaito d'un air intimidant, en le regardant droit dans les yeux, et tendez très lentement la main vers son cou. Le chien pousse un grognement sourd et ouvre légèrement la mâchoire, mais votre regard implacable semble le clouer sur place. Lorsque vous le saisissez fermement par le collier, son corps se détend d'un seul coup et il se couche docilement sur le ventre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous dressez devant Glaito d'un air intimidant, en le regardant droit dans les yeux, et tendez très lentement la main vers son cou. Le chien pousse un grognement sourd et ouvre légèrement la mâchoire, mais votre regard implacable semble le clouer sur place. Lorsque vous le saisissez fermement par le collier, son corps se détend d'un seul coup et il se couche docilement sur le ventre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトの目をまっすぐに見据えながら、あなたは威圧的に彼にのしかかり、ゆっくりと、しかし確実に彼の首へと手を伸ばしていく。犬は低く唸り声を上げ、わずかに顎を開いた。あなたの重々しい視線が彼を地面に釘付けにしているようだ。グライトの首輪をしっかりと掴むと、彼の全身から力が抜け、なすすべもなく腹ばいに横たわった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトの目をまっすぐに見据えながら、あなたは威圧的に彼にのしかかり、ゆっくりと、しかし確実に彼の首へと手を伸ばしていく。犬は低く唸り声を上げ、わずかに顎を開いた。あなたの重々しい視線が彼を地面に釘付けにしているようだ。グライトの首輪をしっかりと掴むと、彼の全身から力が抜け、なすすべもなく腹ばいに横たわった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Miras fijamente a los ojos de Glaito y te yergues sobre él con gesto amenazante, alargando la mano de forma lenta e inexorable hacia su cuello. El perro emite un gruñido grave y abre ligeramente sus fauces, pero tu mirada parece tenerlo clavado al suelo. Al agarrar a Glaito por el collar, ves que su cuerpo se desploma y queda tumbado impotente sobre su panza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Miras fijamente a los ojos de Glaito y te yergues sobre él con gesto amenazante, alargando la mano de forma lenta e inexorable hacia su cuello. El perro emite un gruñido grave y abre ligeramente sus fauces, pero tu mirada parece tenerlo clavado al suelo. Al agarrar a Glaito por el collar, ves que su cuerpo se desploma y queda tumbado impotente sobre su panza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你死死地瞪着格雷托的眼睛，目光充满了恐吓意味，一步步向它逼近，手慢慢地伸向它的脖颈。格雷托发出一声低吼，下颚微微张开，但你沉重的目光似乎将它死死地压在地上。随后，你紧紧抓住了格雷托的项圈。格雷托浑身瘫软，四脚朝天，无助地躺在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你死死地瞪着格雷托的眼睛，目光充满了恐吓意味，一步步向它逼近，手慢慢地伸向它的脖颈。格雷托发出一声低吼，下颚微微张开，但你沉重的目光似乎将它死死地压在地上。随后，你紧紧抓住了格雷托的项圈。格雷托浑身瘫软，四脚朝天，无助地躺在了地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tehditkâr bakışlarını Glaito'nun gözlerine dikiyorsun, yavaş ancak kararlı bir hareketle tasmasına davranıyorsun. Köpek, alçak sesle hırıldıyor. Çenesi hafifçe aralanıyor ancak ezici bakışlarının altında olduğu yere mimleniyor. Tasmasından sıkıca kavrıyorsun, karşılığında köpeğin vücudunun gevşediğini duyumsuyorsun. Glaito, en sonunda çaresizce karnının üzerine yatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking Glaito right in the eye, you loom over him intimidatingly, slowly but inexorably reaching toward his neck. The dog lets out a low growl, his jaw opening slightly, but your heavy gaze seems to keep him pinned to the ground. Taking Glaito firmly by the collar, you see his whole body go limp, and he lies down helplessly on his belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tehditkâr bakışlarını Glaito'nun gözlerine kilitliyorsun, yavaş ancak kararlı bir hareketle tasmasına davranıyorsun. Köpek alçak sesle hırıldıyor, çenesi hafifçe aralanıyor ancak ezici bakışlarının altında olduğu yere mimleniyor. Tasmasından sıkıca kavrıyorsun, karşılığında köpeğin vücudunun gevşediğini duyumsuyorsun. Glaito, en sonunda çaresizce karnının üzerine yatıyor.{/n}
